scenes.name: Prologue.credits
scenes.text: Ah, hello there! <pause><pause>Curious about our Company, are you? <pause><pause>Well, let me give you a quick rundown.<newline><newline><pause><pause>We’re a cozy little operation with a slightly overworked but dedicated staff. <pause><pause>In the story department, it’s just me -<pause><pause> NARRATOR -<pause><pause> along with my esteemed colleagues, Narrator and narrator. <pause><pause>Of course, that is only the story department.

We’re not alone in this endeavor. <pause><pause>Behind the scenes, there’s a talented group of artists working tirelessly to bring all the backgrounds to life. <pause><pause><italics>You hear a soft chuckle and a faint ‘Pst!’ in the background.</italics> <pause><pause>But we’re just the humble staff; the real masterminds are our executives.<newline><newline><pause><pause>There’s the Chief Technology Officer, the savant genius who wrote all the code, uqers; <pause>the Chief Writing Officer, who drew all endings and penned every word, euriohh; <pause>and the Chief Executive Officer, the brilliant mind behind this project, Firey.
